title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, and browsers (via proxy).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer allowing any Ollama model to be used as an LLM or embedder in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama comparable to ChatGPT UI; markdown, code highlighting, model manager.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings, list/pull/delete models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (text UI) client for Ollama written in Go; chat, manage models, keyboard driven.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-crewai
summary: CrewAI support for local Ollama models, enabling autonomous agents without external API keys.

title: ollama-cord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model; slash commands, thread support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that exposes Ollama chat as a slash command or app mention in workspaces.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU or CPU mode, PVC, and autoscaler.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing Ollama binary, module, and overlay for declarative NixOS deployments.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-function-calling
summary: Experimental addon that patches Ollama chat to support OpenAI-style function/tool calling.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of custom GGUF models ready to run with Ollama, sorted by domain.

title: r/ollama - Local LLM ecosystem discussion
summary: Active subreddit for sharing tools, integrations, troubleshooting, and model recommendations around Ollama.
